subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs seem aware that the Memphis Grizzlies are also a team willing to grind things out in the all-function, no-form style that the Spurs have patented.
snippet: The San Antonio Spurs seem aware that the Memphis Grizzlies are also a team willing to grind things out in the all-function, no-form style that the Spurs have patented.
